ws2d.init

Class Ws2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws2d.init.Ws2D

  • public final class Ws2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all unconnected parts of Ws2D, including the physics engine, server, and more. This class is self-contained, so its instance can be accessed from itself.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Boots the Ws2D platform from a given game jar file.

      Returns the one and only instance of Ws2D.
      static Registry getRegistry()
      Returns the registry of Ws2D.
      static Server getServer()
      Returns the current running server instance.
      void shutdown()
      Ends the current session of Ws2D.
